sentences: Operatsiooni läbimiseks vajab ta aega taastumaks.
context: The word 'operatsiooni' is the genitive case form of 'operatsioon' in Estonian, meaning operation or surgery. It indicates that something belongs to an operation or relates to it. In medical contexts, it specifically refers to surgical procedures. The genitive case shows possession or relationship, similar to saying 'of an operation' or related to an operation in English.
